Detailed Description

A class to process the covariate command line.

Definition at line 45 of file CNAnalysisMethodCovariateParams.h.

Member Function Documentation

void CovariateParams::determineCovariateMap ( BaseEngine &  engine  )  [static]

Initializes the signal and LR covariate map members.

The value represents the index in CNProbeSet::getCovariateValue(). The index is the CovariateEnum. Side effect: this method also initializes the number of bins and binning type paramters.

Definition at line 249 of file CNAnalysisMethodCovariateParams.cpp.

References SelfCreate::fillInNameParam(), Options::getOpt(), Options::isOptDefined(), Verbose::out(), and Convert::toString().

void CovariateParams::restoreCovariateParams ( std::string  str  )  [static]

Restore covariate parameter from the Parameters section of the CN reference to the corresponding class member:

"all" -> m_allCovariateMap "signal" -> m_vSignalCovariates "log2ratio -> m_vLRCovariates "signal-binning-types" -> m_vSignalBinningType "signal-bin-sizes" -> m_vSignalBinSizes "log2ratio-binning-types" -> m_vLRBinningType "log2ratio-bin-sizes" -> m_vLRBinSizes "log2ratio-iqr-scaling" -> m_vIQRScaling "log2ratio-subtract-from-XY" -> m_vLRSubractFromXY
